file_content.text:
THORN ASSISTANCE REQUEST URGENT ACTION REQUIRED
THORN seeks able-bodied and fully inoculated free agents to aid in the quarantine zone established in and around Mos Ila. Anyone displaying telltale signs of the early stages of rakghoul infection could potentially place the rest of the planet at risk and must be inoculated immediately. Doses of medicine will be made available upon acceptance of this request for assistance.
